text: tavada (madinavehi æti) kavurun (madinava tamange) rata vasayen- (makkavehi sita pæmini muhajirvarun vana) ovunta kalinma-gena, visvasaya taba sitiyoda ovuntada, (ehi kotasak æta). movun hijrat kara, taman veta pæminena ayava adarayen yutuva priya karana atara (tamanta nodi, hijrat karamin pæminena) ovunta (pamanak) denu læbima gænada, tama sit tula adupaduvak vasayen dakinne næta. tavada tamanta dilindukama at vuvada, tamanta vada ovuntama (denu læbima) tora ganu labannaha. mese kavurun tanhaven tamanva araksa kara gannoda, evænnanma jayagrahanaya at kara gat ayayi
